遜.definition: to abdicate; modest; yielding; unpretentious; inferior to; (slang) to suck

遜位.definition: to abdicate; to resign a position

遜克.definition: Xunke county in Heihe 黑河[Hei1 he2], Heilongjiang

遜克縣.definition: Xunke county in Heihe 黑河[Hei1 he2], Heilongjiang

遜色.definition: inferior (often in the combination 毫無遜色|毫无逊色, not in the least inferior)
